```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("00_requirements.R")
source("01_plot_functions.R")
load("../data/41_NBA-Analysis.RData")
```

``` {r}
defense_model <- nba_processed %>%
  mutate(Win = as.numeric(`Win/Loss Status` == "W")) %>%  
  glm(
    Win ~ `Defensive Rebounds` + `Steals` + `Personal Fouls` + `Blocks`,
    data = .,
    family = binomial(link = "logit")
  )

summary(defense_model)
```
